This article is about the shop owner. For the 2021 Christmas event NPC, see Herquin (2021 Christmas event).

NPC ID6529

Herquin owns the shop Herquin's Gems in the city of Falador. He can be found in his shop south of the western Falador bank.

Herquin was visited during the 2018 Birthday event, helping the player with finding a semi-precious blue gem to use for their prop sword.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Stock
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Herquin is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: Surrounded by white walls and gems.
